exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12"  right="0" bottom="0"/>
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="Skin.Card" width="58" height="81" currentState="fall_right" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"
        states="stand_down,stand_up,stand_left,stand_right,fall_down,fall_up,fall_left,fall_right,hide_v,hide_h"
        width.stand_down="85" height.stand_down="122" width.stand_up="47" height.stand_up="66" width.stand_left="36.8"
        height.stand_left="74.4" width.stand_right="36.8" height.stand_right="74.4" width.fall_left="56" height.fall_left="47"
        width.fall_right="56" height.fall_right="47" width.hide_v="86" height.hide_v="120" width.hide_h="64"
        height.hide_h="53" width.fall_down="47" height.fall_down="67" width.fall_up="47" height.fall_up="67">
	<e:Image id="bg" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"
	         width.stand_down="100%" height.stand_down="100%" width.stand_up="100%" height.stand_up="100%"
	         width.stand_left="100%" height.stand_left="100%"
	         width.stand_right="100%" height.stand_right="100%"
	         scaleX.stand_right="-1" x.stand_right="46" width.fall_down="100%"
	         height.fall_down="100%" width="100%" height="100%"
	        
	          x.fall_left="0" y.fall_left="0" source="" scaleX.stand_left="1" scaleY.stand_left="1" anchorOffsetY.stand_left="0" source.stand_down="cards_json.standbg_down" source.stand_up="cards_json.standbg_up" source.stand_left="cards_json.standbg_left" source.stand_right="cards_json.standbg_left" source.fall_down="cards_json.fallbg_V" source.fall_left="cards_json.fallbg_H" source.fall_right="cards_json.fallbg_H" source.hide_v="cards_json.hidebg_V" source.hide_h="cards_json.hidebg_H" source.fall_up="cards_json.fallbg_V"/>
	<e:Image id="fallRight" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"
	         includeIn="fall_right"  horizontalCenter="0" top="0" rotation="270" source="card_small_25"/>
	<e:Image id="fallLeft" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" includeIn="fall_left"
	          top="0" horizontalCenter="0" rotation="90" source="card_small_25"/>
	<e:Image id="fallUp" includeIn="fall_up"
	         rotation="0"  scaleX="-1" scaleY="-1" y="50" horizontalCenter="0" source="cards_json.card_small_51"/>
	<e:Image id="fallDown" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" includeIn="fall_down"
	          y="6" horizontalCenter="0" width="66%" height="66%" source="cards_json.card_small_50"/>
	<e:Image id="standDown" width="100%" height="100%" includeIn="stand_down"  source="card_big_25_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="Skin.CardModLayout" width="1172" height="240" currentState="Up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:LC="LC.*" states="Down,Up,Left,Right" width.Left="218"
        height.Left="750" width.Down="1334" width.Up="1334" width.Right="218" height.Right="750" height.Down="297"
        height.Up="283.66">
	<e:Group id="AllCards" width="0" anchorOffsetY.Up="0" width.Left="56" height.Left="100%" y.Left="0"
	         height.Up="81" width.Right="56" height.Right="100%" y.Right="0" width.Down="100%" width.Up="100%" top.Up="0"
	         horizontalCenter.Up="0" left.Left="0" right.Right="0" x.Down="0" height.Down="104" bottom.Down="0">
		<e:Group id="HandCards" x="210" y="122.00000000000001" includeInLayout="true" width.Left="46" width.Right="46" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap.Down="-5" gap.Up="-6" gap.Right="-50" verticalAlign.Up="bottom"/>
			</e:layout>
			<e:layout.Right>
			<e:VerticalLayout gap="-46"/>
			</e:layout.Right>
			<e:layout.Left>
			<e:VerticalLayout verticalAlign="middle" gap="-46"/>
			</e:layout.Left>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="FallHandCards" x="-210" y="-122.00000000000001" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" height.Down="104">
			<e:layout.Right>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="-13"/>
			</e:layout.Right>
			<e:layout.Left>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="-13"/>
			</e:layout.Left>
			<e:layout.Up>
				<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="-2" verticalAlign="top"/>
			</e:layout.Up>
			<e:layout.Down>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="-4" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="bottom"/>
			</e:layout.Down>
		</e:Group>

		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="10" verticalAlign="bottom" horizontalAlign="center"   verticalAlign.Up="bottom" verticalAlign.Down="top"/>
		</e:layout>
		<e:layout.Right>
			<e:VerticalLayout verticalAlign="middle" horizontalAlign="left"  gap="-10"/>
		</e:layout.Right>
		<e:layout.Left>
			<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"  gap="-10"/>
		</e:layout.Left>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="OutCards" verticalCenter.Left="0" verticalCenter.Right="0" anchorOffsetY.Up="0" horizontalCenter.Up="0.5"
	         bottom.Up="0" top.Down="0" horizontalCenter.Down="0" right.Left="0" left.Right="0" scaleX.Left="-1" scaleX.Up="-1" scaleY.Up="-1" scaleX.Down="1" scaleY.Down="1">
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="-4" verticalAlign.Up="bottom" />
		</e:layout>
		<e:layout.Right>
			<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="-3" verticalGap="-15" rowHeight="47" columnWidth="56" requestedRowCount="6"
			              requestedColumnCount="3" orientation="columns" />
		</e:layout.Right>
		<e:layout.Left>
			<e:TileLayout rowHeight="47" columnWidth="56" requestedRowCount="6" requestedColumnCount="3" orientation="columns"
			              horizontalGap="-3" verticalGap="-15" />
		</e:layout.Left>
		<e:layout.Up>
			<e:TileLayout rowHeight="67" columnWidth="47" requestedRowCount="3"
			              requestedColumnCount="6"  orientation="rows" verticalGap="-7" horizontalGap="-9"/>
		</e:layout.Up>
		<e:layout.Down>
			<e:TileLayout rowHeight="67" requestedRowCount="3" columnWidth="47" requestedColumnCount="6" horizontalGap="-9"
			              orientation="rows" verticalGap="-18" />
		</e:layout.Down>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="Skin.ComboCards" width="185" height="112" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"          xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:LC="LC.*" states="Horizental,Vertical" width.Vertical="56"          height.Vertical="120" width.Horizental="131" height.Horizental="81">
	<e:Group includeIn="Horizental" y.Vertical="14" y.Horizental="14" bottom="0">
		<LC:Card id="cardH_0" width="47" height="67" x="0" skinName="Skin.Card" anchorOffsetX="23" anchorOffsetY="33.5"             scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="0" includeIn="Horizental" currentState="fall_down" />
		<LC:Card id="cardH_1" width="47" height="67" x="64" skinName="Skin.Card" anchorOffsetX="23.5" anchorOffsetY="33.5"             currentState="fall_down" />
		<LC:Card id="cardH_2" width="47" height="67" skinName="Skin.Card" anchorOffsetX="23.5" anchorOffsetY="33.5"             currentState="fall_down" />
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="-5" />
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<LC:Card id="cardH_3" width="47" height="67" skinName="Skin.Card" anchorOffsetX="23.5" anchorOffsetY="33.5"            currentState="fall_down" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width.Vertical="64" height.Vertical="53"            currentState.Vertical="fall_left" x.Vertical="0" y.Vertical="20" includeIn="Horizental" y.Horizental="34.5"            currentState.Horizental="fall_down" x="64.5" />
	<e:Group includeIn="Vertical" x="0" y="0">
		<LC:Card id="cardV_0" width="56" height="47" x="0" skinName="Skin.Card" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"
		         currentState="fall_left" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="0" includeIn="Vertical" />
		<LC:Card id="cardV_1" width="56" height="47" x="0" skinName="Skin.Card" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"
		         currentState="fall_left" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="32" includeIn="Vertical" />
		<LC:Card id="cardV_2" width="56" height="47" skinName="Skin.Card" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"
		         currentState="fall_left" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="64" x="0" includeIn="Vertical" />
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout gap="-13" />
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<LC:Card id="cardV_3" width="56" height="47" x="0" skinName="Skin.Card" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"
	         currentState="fall_left" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="21" includeIn="Vertical" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="Skins.LCButton" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="120" height="60" width.down="130" height.down="70">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="kwx_hall_two_bt_png"
             source.down="kwx_hall_two_bt_png" scaleX.down="1.2" scaleY.down="1.2"
             source.disabled="kwx_hall_two_bt1_png" scale9Grid="30,28,121,33" />
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8" size="20" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" includeIn="up,disabled" />
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" includeIn="up,disabled" />
    <e:BitmapLabel id="labelImage" width="100%" height="100%" text="加" font="btn_fnt" verticalCenter="0"
                   horizontalCenter="0" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6" text.down="" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="Skin.LCProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0" source="PreLoadingBarBg_png"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="20%" width="90.5%" source="PreLoadingBar_png" y="22" left="30"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" text="5232" y="19"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="Skin.UserHead" width="166" height="190" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="label_ready" text="已准备" y="2" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Group width="123" height="123" y="38" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="kwx_avatar_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="headImg" width="110" height="110" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="headShade" source="kwx_avater3_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="32" y="43" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="headShadeT" source="kwx_avater3_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="-7" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>

		<e:Rect id="tgRect" width="114" height="110" strokeAlpha="1" fillAlpha="0.65" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="4" y="2" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>

		<e:Image id="headOwner" x="-8" y="-1" source="kwx_game_house_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>

		<e:Image id="headQuestionImg" source="kwx_avater2_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="-3" y="1"/>
		<e:Image id="duanxianImg" source="kwx_avater4_png" y="10" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="11" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="sidai" width="133" height="57" y="58" source="kwx_sidai_png" horizontalCenter="0" x="-5" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="off_line" width="138" height="33" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="kwx_duanxin_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="-8" y="41" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="tuoGuanIcon" source="kwx_tuoguanzhong_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="10" y="37" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="img_banker" x="85" y="-3" source="kwx_g_zhuang_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>












	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" text="0" y="137" size="25" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="label_Name" size="25" width="183" verticalAlign="top" textAlign="center" multiline="true" maxChars="5" text="" height="25" y="162" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="Skin.Disc" width="154" height="154" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:LC="LC.*">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="disc_bg_png" width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="dark_bg" width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="disc_dark_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="disc_dark_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="0" y="154" rotation="270" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="disc_dark_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="154" y="154" rotation="180" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="disc_dark_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="154" y="0" rotation="90" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="lights" width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="10" y="10">
		<e:Image source="disc_light_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="100%" height="100%"/>
		<e:Image source="disc_light_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" rotation="270" width="100%" height="100%"/>

			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>

	</e:Panel>
</e:Skin>
